content.query:
-- type your sql script here, we now have intellisense

-- Specify schema
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET ('CosmosDB',
  'Account=lbosq-mongo-synapse;Database=test;region=WestUS2;Key=safFnUlXivshgFi1flrWnSk7KK2Tf6xNA6WBXWZffjl6HFM9V6XYML4tERD0su6nwheelnxQk0y6XDjKwjPFJw==',
  docTest
) WITH (
        productSKU varchar(256) '$.productSKU.string',
        price_float float '$.price.float64',
        price_int32 bigint '$.price.int32',
        purchaseDate_string varchar(256) '$.purchaseDate.string',
        purchaseDate_int32 bigint '$.purchaseDate.int32',
        product
)
AS p
GO
